description: Allows you to purchase Amazon OpenSearch Service Reserved Instances.

parameters.name: ReservedInstanceOfferingId
parameters.description: The ID of the Reserved Instance offering to purchase.

parameters.name: ReservationName
parameters.description: A customer-specified identifier to track this reservation.

nested_items.name: ReservedInstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Reserved Instance offering that was purchased.

nested_items.name: ReservationName
nested_items.description: The customer-specified identifier used to track this reservation.
